sentences.en: get a load of what we've just done.
sentences.cn: 瞧瞧我们刚才做的。

sentences.en: A lorry piled with scrap metal had shed its load.
sentences.cn: 一辆载满废金属的卡车掉货了。

sentences.en: A Luton van has additional load space over the driver's cab.
sentences.cn: 卢顿厢式货车的驾驶室上方有富余的装载空间。

sentences.en: Don’t worry, there’s loads of time.
sentences.cn: 不用担心，时间很充裕。

sentences.en: Have you finished loading up?
sentences.cn: 你装完货了吗？

sentences.en: He drove by with a big load of hay.
sentences.cn: 他载着一大车干草驶过。

sentences.en: He was carrying a very heavy load.
sentences.cn: 他身上背着沉甸甸的东西。

sentences.en: High blood pressure imposes an extra load on the heart.
sentences.cn: 高血压会给心脏增加额外的负担。

sentences.en: His people came up with a load of embarrassing information.
sentences.cn: 他的部下亮出一大堆令人尴尬的资料来。

sentences.en: Hold the baby while I load the car.
sentences.cn: 你先抱着孩子，让我把东西装上车。

sentences.en: I knew how to load and handle a gun.
sentences.cn: 我知道怎么上子弹，也知道枪怎么用。

sentences.en: I've never heard such a load of nonsense.
sentences.cn: 如此一派胡言，本人闻所未闻。

sentences.en: I've never heard such a load of tripe in all my life.
sentences.cn: 我一辈子还从没听到过这样一堆废话。

sentences.en: It is a tedious, humourless load of crap.
sentences.cn: 那是一堆枯燥乏味、毫无幽默感的废话。

sentences.en: It is important to judge the weight of your washing load correctly.
sentences.cn: 正确估计待洗衣物的重量很重要。

sentences.en: It took an hour to load the van.
sentences.cn: 给小型货车装货花了一小时。

sentences.en: She's taking some of the load off the secretaries.
sentences.cn: 她在给秘书们减轻一些工作量。

sentences.en: The load was too burden-some.
sentences.cn: 工作量过于繁重。

sentences.en: The lorry hadshed its load(= the load had fallen off ).
sentences.cn: 卡车上的货掉下来了。

sentences.en: The plane was carrying afull loadof fuel.
sentences.cn: 飞机载满燃料。

sentences.en: These guys talk an awful load of old cobblers.
sentences.cn: 这些人纯粹是胡说八道。

sentences.en: We got a load of complaints about the loud music.
sentences.cn: 很多人向我们投诉音乐太响。

sentences.en: Will you help me load the dishwasher?
sentences.cn: 你帮我把碗碟放进洗碗机好吗？

words.tran_cn: 负荷的；装填子弹的；装好胶卷的；喝醉了的（美国俚语）；阔绰的（美国俚语）
装货的人；载入程序；装货设备；装填器
装载，装填，担负（load的ing形式）； 装入

phrases.tran_cn: 轴向载荷；轴向负荷；轴向荷载

phrases.phrase: load the dice against/in favour of someone
take a (或 the) load off one's feet
take a load off someone's mind

trans.tran_cn: 负载，装载量，承载量，大量，工作量，沉重感，供电量

trans.tran_en: to put a program into a computer
to put a program into a computer
